participant_1.background:
I'm not a morning person, but I love reading mystery novels.
i am recently divorced.
i listen to podcasts.
i like to fly kites.
i daydream about cafes in paris.

participant_2.background:
I've been single for a while now because I'm too focused on my career.
sometimes i wish i did not have to wake up in the morning.
My job is secure and I get paid well.
My parents were very supportive of my interests and hobbies.
I'm a safari guide who loves to read in my spare time.

content.text: My name is Karen.  It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too, Karen.  What are you interested in?
I like reading mystery novels, listening to podcasts, flying kites, and daydreaming about cafes in Paris.
Those all sound like fun things!  I love reading too, but I don't do much of it anymore because I'm always so busy with my job.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a safari guide.  It's a lot of work, but I love it.
That sounds really cool!  I've always wanted to go on safari.
You should definitely do it sometime!  It's an amazing experience.
I will!  Thanks for the advice.
No problem!  So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom.  I love it, but it can be a lot of work too.
I bet it can!  But it's also really important work.  You're raising the next generation of people!
I'm sure you're doing a great job.
